title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-6.2 - Gas-fired boilers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-6.2 - Gas-fired boilers

State Regulations

Gas-fired boilers not exceeding 100 square feet of
heating surface shall be provided with a single or double cone type of hood
diverter in the stack. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-6.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
